tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I reached out to Dr. Jigar Gala for a cavity caused by wisdom tooth. He is friendly, confident and was very gentle in tooth extraction and root canal. He uses advanced technology and is fast at doing the procedures, which helps in reducing the recovery time. He is accessible, if one has issues. 

Would definitely recommend this doctor.

review: I visited for dental sensitivity problem. He inspected and suggested that since the tooth needed root canal. So he explained in detail the procedure. We agreed to continue and the treatment given was so smooth. I didn’t even feel much pain and it was done very smoothly. Thank you Dr Jigar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Jigar is extremely professional and good with his work. My experience with him has been far superior than other dentists in the past.

He explains you the exact diagnosis, with solutions and timelines very clearly and he and his team will make you feel welcomed and comfortable.

He has a very well maintained and nicely done up facility with all the safety measures in this pandemic. I felt absolutely comfortable to revisit during the pandemic for continued treatment. Thank you Dr. Jigar & team

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I am under Dr. Gala the senior & Dr. Jigar Gala for i’ve two decades. I am very happy & feel that I & my family are in safe & skilled hands.
I wish them success & devine blessings in all that they are doing

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have been consulting Dr. Gala since past several years for all issues related to dental problems and trust him completely for the treatment he recommends each time. All queries are always answered by him patiently and satisfactorily. No unnecessary procedures are ever recommended. If no treatment is required according to him, at times he even just extends honorary guidance. Have recommended him to several of my acquaintances too, including overseas guests during their visit to Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He has adopted all modern and latest equipments and procedures. We feel very comfortable and safe. I myself was so much afraid of the treatment that I was avoiding going to dentist but now I feel it's a very easy and unpainful treatment just because of Jigar's expertise and confidence. His staff is also very efficient. How can I forget his father which adds to your confidence in the atmosphere. Overall it was very fast and perfect treatments.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Both father and son are Very approachable. My root canal filling had come out and Dr. Jigar Gala promptly gave me an appointment for the very next day without any airs about how busy his schedule is which most doctors these days do. I rchd 10 minutes before my scheduled appointment and was taken in without any wait time. Dr. Gala respects patient’s time unlike most dentists who start their day late and mess up appointments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Would wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Jigar for all dental problems.  In fact, our family is in love with Dr. Jigar not just because of his pleasing personality, but also because the doctor really cares for you.  The dental issue and solution, no of sittings, etc is explained well, and the procedures are carried out in perfect harmony.
